creator: yangzhongcbh@163.com
text:
I can't open a html file from desktop, when the apache is open,
when the server is open , I can't open a html from desktop or a category, it 
open is very slowly, and when I shutdown the apache, the file opened quickly, 
this problem is happened after I install the "microsoft  windows script 5.6" , 
I always used the apache before this , and it is very nice before install 
the "microsoft  windows script 5.6" , I have tried the apache 1.3.23 &1.3.24 
and found the problem all. why? apache server can't run with "microsoft  
windows script 5.6" ?
(I use windows 98 (oem 2) and the pc is  intel 700Mhz, 256M SDRAM DIMM)

This sounds far to specific to your machine's configuration.  Afraid that
we can't help much with that sort of machine-specific tangle.

If WSH 5.6 caused the problems, I suppose you can guess a recommeneded fix.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
